page.title: 20FARMING IN OUR AREA 4
page.content: The owner of Bayton farm if Mr J. Harper.It is an arable and beef farm. The main crops are barley sugar beat and oats.He has owns 4 tractors,1 combine,1 baler,1 plough,2 trailers and 1 sprayer.7 people work on the farm and 1 child.The farm is 156 acres. Mr and Mrs Bowen own Wallhouse Farm which is in Brampton Abbotts.The farm is half barley and half grass.The farm has no tractors or anything one uses for a farm because Mr Bowen runs a business with lorries and contracting, not a farm.Mr Brooke rents the land to make hay and grow crops.On the farm Mr Bowen has 5 workers and 6 lorries.Mr Bowen's land covers 40 acres. { Farming text's { by { } { Class 4
